snippet: Attorney General Kathleen Kane lost a court challenge over an investigation that recommended she be charged criminally in the leaks of secret material.
abstract: Pennsylvania Supreme Court approves special investigation into whether Atty Gen Kathleen Kane leaked secret material, rejecting challenge by Kane.
lead_paragraph: Attorney General Kathleen Kane lost a court challenge over an investigation that recommended she be charged criminally in the leaks of secret material.

headline.main: Pennsylvania: Court Turns Down Attorney General
headline.print_headline: Pennsylvania: Court Turns Down Attorney General
